QuestData.Title: Supplies Needed: More Husks!
QuestData.Description: I need more husks, Thorodir! The Lady herself wants to make sure we are outfitted with the finest armor.$b$bThey've been soaking in the waters long enough to be workable. Find some time to retrieve them before our hunters find themselves without adequate protection.$b$b<The work order is signed: "Cavina.">
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Deliver the husks to Gormsmith Cavina.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm glad you found my note. Husks such as these need to soak in running water for several days before they can be shaped without breaking.$b$bAt least you were able to salvage something.
